name: CommunitiesUtil

methods.name: getLogoutUrl
methods.description: Returns the page to display after the current community user logs out.

methods.name: getUserDisplayName
methods.description: Returns the current user’s community display name.

methods.name: isGuestUser
methods.description: Indicates whether the current user isn’t logged in to the community and may need to be redirected to log in, if required.

methods.name: isInternalUser
methods.description: Indicates whether the current user is logged in as a member of the parent Salesforce organization, such as an employee.

description: Contains methods for getting information about a community
